data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Gaborone to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gaborone, Botswana
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Gaborone.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, move the 19,123 believers in the state of Gaborone to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 79,869 lost people in  Gaborone, Botswana have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Gaborone, Botswana who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Gaborone, Botswana so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gaborone, Botswana has a population of 231,600.

We estimate Gaborone has 19,123 people who might know Jesus, 132,608 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 79,869 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 19,123 believers in the state of Gaborone into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

location.name: Gaborone
location.people_groups_list: Kgalagadi, South Asian, general, Subia, Nambya, Hua
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kgalagadi (69,000), South Asian, general (5,200), Subia (6,800), Nambya (19,000), Hua (40)
